revised_title: Observations on the Relative Periods of Testaceous Animal Creation and Gradual Approximation in British Strata
tldr: The author, Lewis Weston Dillwyn, writes a letter to Sir Humphry Davy discussing the relative periods of testaceous animal creation and the gradual approximation observed in British strata. He notes the differences in external and internal ligaments in various strata and the extinction of species in the London clay.
